name: Leviathan: Realms (Demo)
description:
Emil, the Celestial of this universe, has messed up.

Not taking into account paradoxes, Emil has created some errors that put his entire universe at stake.  Now, Emil asks some of his most trusted companions to help him out in fixing all causality errors.

Help Emil and play through this Tactics inspired game that is intended to be ported to a phone.

Grind levels, solve puzzles, and take down bosses!

But remember... You can't save everybody.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Special thanks: Celine : )
